dct_title_s: Terra sancta sive promissionis, olim Palestina
dct_description_sm: recens delineata, et in lucem edita per Nicolaum Visscher ; C.J. Visscher excud.
Coordinates approximate and based on Greenwich meridian.
2 bar scales on map given in "Milliaria germanica communia" and "Milliaria unius horae".
Shows topography, drainage, territories of the twelve tribes of Israel, travel routes, places of historical interest.
Includes illustrations of a compass rose and ships.
Decorative title cartouche with a fruit garland supported by six cherubs.
Appears in Nicolaes Visscher's Atlas contractus orbis terrarum.
